title: r/Pettyrevenge I Gave A Cop A Ticket!
description:
r/Pettyrevenge In today's episode, OP pulls something off that the rest of us have only ever fantasized about: He basically gave a cop a ticket! It was a perfect storm moment where the egotistical cop goes too far and the cop's sergeant backs up OP for this amazing instant karma moment. If you enjoyed this content, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
